desc: The 7 leaders of the Akras Summoners' Hall Demon Slayers--Griff, Iris, Kafka, Rhoa, Libera, Krantz, and Mirfah--head to the world of Ishgria to survey the land. However, they face an enormous demon soon after arriving. Their leader, Griff, goes after the demon alone. As acting commander, Krantz leads the rest to where the return gate should be, but...
name: Entrusted Will
